titles.title: MP35 Angels from the realms of glory

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Angels from the realms of glory,
wing your flight through all the earth:
heralds of creation's story,
now proclaim Messiah's birth!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Shepherds in the field abiding,
watching by your flocks at night,
God with man is now residing,
see, there shines the infant light!

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines:
Though an infant now we view Him,
He shall share his Father's throne,
gather all the nations to him;
every knee shall then bow down:

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Come and worship,
Christ, the new-born King
come and worship,
worship Christ, the new-born King.
